backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, app settings, sermon cache, and app release info with access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including settings, prayer, weather, and navigation modules.
frontend/docs/android-webview-template.m: Documentation outlining a Kotlin WebView-based Android wrapper template for the web app with notifications and caching.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata, fonts, favicon, and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing header, weather summary, tab router, and all feature tabs including the prayer tracker.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Stub auth button component that renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/MobileTabsNav.ts: Responsive tab navigation component with primary tabs and overflow menu supporting all feature tab content.
frontend/src/components/SelectLocationPr: Displays a card prompting the user to select a location with a button callback.
frontend/src/components/TabsOverflowMenu: Renders an overflow dropdown menu listing extra tabs and triggers selection callbacks.
Provides static morning and evening adhkar data arrays with text and repetition counts.
frontend/src/features/adhkar/MorningEven: Shows morning and evening adhkar lists with checkboxes, completion tracking, and reset actions.
frontend/src/features/app-release/curren: Exports the current app version constant used for update comparisons.
frontend/src/features/app-release/semver: Implements semantic version comparison and a helper to check for newer versions.
frontend/src/features/app-release/Update: Displays a dismissible update alert when a newer app version is available.
frontend/src/features/app-release/update: Handles storing and retrieving dismissed update versions in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useIsC: React Query hook checking whether the current user has admin privileges.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useLat: Fetches the latest app release metadata from the backend using React Query.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useUpd: Mutation hook for updating app release metadata and invalidating cached queries.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/duaGuide: Tanımlar, kategoriler ve dua listelerini içeren dua veri kaynağıdır.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/DuaGuide: Shows categorized dua lists and a dialog for detailed viewing of selected duas.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Esmaül Hüsna kartını stil, renk ve tıklama işlemleriyle render eder.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/esmaul: Esmaül Hüsna isimleri için ID, Arapça, okunuş, anlam ve dua içeren veri dizisini tanımlar.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Esmaül Hüsna listesini kartlar halinde gösterir ve seçilen ismin detaylarını dialog içinde açar.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Fa: Nafile ve kaza oruçları ile Ramazan günlerini takip etmek için giriş, listeleme ve ayar işlemlerini yönetir.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Ra: Ramazan oruç durumlarını gösterir, ilerleme hesaplar ve günler için durum değiştirme veya sıfırlama işlevleri sunar.
frontend/src/features/hatim/HatimTakipTa: React UI for tracking current Qur'an page, updating progress, and saving state to settings.
frontend/src/features/home/currentPrayer: Utility determining the current prayer time slot by comparing now with adjusted prayer times.
frontend/src/features/home/HomeTab.tsx: Main home screen combining location setup, prayer times, weather, and kerahat-aware prayer listings.
frontend/src/features/home/NextPrayerCou: Displays next prayer time and remaining countdown using a custom hook.
frontend/src/features/home/PrayerTimeCar: Renders interactive cards showing verse, hadith, dua, and esma content based on the current prayer slot.
frontend/src/features/home/time-content/: Static dataset of dua items with Arabic text, Turkish meaning, and occasions.
Static dataset of hadith items with Arabic text, Turkish meaning, and sources.
Defines a VerseItem interface and exports an array of Quran verses with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and references.
frontend/src/features/home/useCurrentPra: React hook that determines and tracks the current prayer time slot, updating every minute.
frontend/src/features/home/useNextPrayer: Hook that calculates the next prayer time and remaining time until it, updating every minute.
frontend/src/features/home/usePrayerTime: Selects deterministic random verse, hadith, dua, and esma content based on the prayer slot.
frontend/src/features/location/LocationS: UI component for searching, selecting, and saving a user’s location using geocoding results.
frontend/src/features/location/openMeteo: Provides functions to search locations via Open-Meteo API and convert results into app-specific Location objects.
frontend/src/features/location/types.ts: Defines Location and GeocodingResult TypeScript interfaces.
frontend/src/features/location/useGeocod: React Query wrapper for performing debounced geocoding searches with caching and retry logic.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/Nam: Displays namaz tutorial UI with rakat info, gender-based steps, and scrollable step cards.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/nam: Contains static data for rakat counts and detailed step-by-step namaz instructions for men and women.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/dista: Provides Haversine distance calculation and a helper to format distances for display.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: UI component allowing users to search for a location via geocoding and select it as temporary or saved location.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/nearb: Fetches nearby mosques from Overpass API, builds mosque objects with distance and optional address, and sorts them.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: Main tab displaying nearby mosques based on active or temporary location, with radius selection and search integration.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/types: Defines the NearbyMosque interface containing ID, coordinates, distance, and optional address.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/useNe: React Query hook querying nearby mosques based on latitude, longitude, and radius.
frontend/src/features/notifications/noti: Centralized notification text templates for prayer times and generic notifications with formatting helpers.
frontend/src/features/prayer-tracker/Pra: UI for tracking daily and kaza prayers, allowing toggling completion and adjusting counters via saved settings.
Fetches daily prayer times from the Aladhan API and maps them into a local PrayerTimes format.
frontend/src/features/prayer/kerahatTime: Computes kerahat windows from prayer times and merges them with prayer entries into a sorted list.
frontend/src/features/prayer/PrayerTimes: Displays adjusted prayer times with kerahat windows, supports editing time offset and requires location settings.
Provides utilities to apply minute offsets to individual times and full prayer time sets.
frontend/src/features/prayer/usePrayerTi: React Query hook that fetches prayer times based on the selected location.
frontend/src/features/qibla/QiblaFinderT: UI component for selecting location and showing Qibla direction using device orientation.
frontend/src/features/qibla/qiblaMath.ts: Contains math utilities to compute the Qibla bearing using great‑circle calculations.
frontend/src/features/qibla/useDeviceOri: React hook that accesses device orientation, requests permissions, and provides compass heading.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/fastingBas: Exports structured text content describing fasting basics and related teachings.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/ramadanMen: Defines a RamadanMenu interface and provides an array of daily sahur/iftar menus.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/RamazanKos: Renders Ramadan Corner UI with prayer times, menus, and content, prompting for location if missing.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/tarawihCon: Exports structured content describing Tarawih prayer details with headings and bullet points.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/useDailyRo: React hook that returns a deterministic daily-rotating Ramadan menu based on local date.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/dat: Provides local date utility functions for day-start normalization, day differences, and Turkish formatting.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/hij: Converts Hijri events to Gregorian dates for a year by scanning days using Intl Islamic calendar.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/rel: Contains fixed Gregorian and Hijri metadata for all major Islamic days in 2026.
Defines TypeScript types for Hijri events and computed Gregorian religious day entries.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/Rel: Renders 2026 Islamic days with next-up highlight and full list using a custom hook.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/use: Hook returning 2026 religious days plus next-up event and remaining days.
frontend/src/features/sermon/CumaHutbesi: Empty placeholder component file for Friday sermon tab.
frontend/src/features/sermon/useLatestSe: Empty placeholder hook file for fetching latest sermon.
frontend/src/features/settings/AdminAppR: Admin-only form for updating latest app release metadata with validation and success/error UI.
frontend/src/features/settings/appSettin: Defines the AppSettingsModel and related types for prayer, fasting, and notification settings.
frontend/src/features/settings/localSett: Loads and saves settings to localStorage with versioned migrations and default values.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsT: Renders UI for adjusting time offset and per‑prayer notification lead times, saving updates via useAppSettings.
frontend/src/features/settings/useAppSet: Provides React hooks to query and update app settings using react‑query and local storage.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/tasbihatD: Contains static tasbihat data entries including texts, translations, and repetition counts.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/TasbihatT: Displays post‑prayer tasbihat items with Arabic text, transliteration, translation, and counts.
frontend/src/features/weather/CompactWea: Shows a compact weather temperature and description summary based on saved location.
frontend/src/features/weather/openMeteoW: Fetches current weather from Open‑Meteo and maps weather codes to human‑readable descriptions.
frontend/src/features/weather/useWeather: React hook that loads weather data for the selected location via react‑query.
frontend/src/features/weather/WeatherSec: Renders a detailed weather card with temperature, description, wind, and humidity, or prompts location selection.
frontend/src/features/zikirmatik/Zikirma: React component for a digital counter with target setting, progress display, and persistence via app settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles, including a patterned background utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/nativeNotifications.t: Utilities for sending native Android notifications via WebView bridge with fallbacks and prayer-specific helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, clearing, and persisting URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for adding a 'Namaz Takibi' tab with daily prayer tracking and kaza counters, including features, notes, and metadata.
